front.div:
Products
Micronisers produces a range of nucleating agents suitable for most
applications. Prifer 3881 Zinc Glycerolate and Prifer 3888 Nano sized
Zinc Glycerolate produced by a patented process are high performance
nucleating agents that give enhanced physical and clarifying properties to
polypropylene.
Microstat 06 (Aluminium Para Tertiary Butyl Benzoate), Microstat 16
(Sodium Benzoate) and Microstat 38 (Lithium Benzoate) are also
available.
Applications
Polypropylene has many applications. Thin wall moulding products eg,
kitchen ware, food containers, drink bottles, garden furniture, washing
machine components, automotive parts, etc, is however a major segment.
The use of polypropylene for these applications requires improvement in
impact strength, stiffness, heat resistance and fast injection moulding
cycle times which are all achievable due to higher crystallisation
temperatures obtained when using high quality nucleating agents.
This improvement in the physical qualities of polypropylene can be
achieved by using Micronisers nucleating agents.
